path: artifacts/MiniSports Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.MiniSports: contracts/MiniSports Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit/MiniSports

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()`, `_getCurrentSupply`, `_transfer()`, and `_removeOldSellHistories()` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list or sell history list is too long.
